title: Overalls and Barn Boots
description:
Sarah Langs joins Buster to discuss Miguel Cabrera hitting home run No. 499, the short list of players with 3,000 hits and 500 home runs Miggy is about to join, the Field of Dreams game and if outfield fence should’ve been a cornfield, and Sarah’s leaderboards for AL and NL Cy Young and MVP. Then, Todd Radom stops by with this week’s Forgotten Franchise and the quiz.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Sarah Langs and Buster talk Miggy's HR milestone, Field of Dreams game, and Cy Young and MVP leaderboards. Plus, Todd Radom with the Forgotten Franchise
